variables.name: Determine the day of the week for {{1.startdate}}
Check If {{1.email}} has "@" and ".com" symbols
variables.value: {{if(contains(1.email; "@") + " = " + (true & contains(1.email; ".com")) + "=" + true; " Valid email contains @ & .com"; "Invalid email")}}

variables.name: Add 3 business days to {{1.startdate}} and format it as “Feb 23rd, 12 PM”
Extract the first word (name) from the {{1.email}} and capitalize it (e.g., john.dou@company.com → John)
Calculate the difference in days between two dates {{1.startdate}} and {{1.enddate}}
Swap the words in the text {{1.`full name`}} to “John Dou”
Remove decimal digits (e.g., 1234.56 → 1,234) and add a thousands separator (e.g., 1000000 → 1,000,000)
